CustomField.formula:
If( AND (Text( Valid_Fill_Request_Approval_Status__c )="Approved" , NOT (IsNull( FS_Scheduled_Date__c )), FS_Activity_Complete__c), "5 Complete",
If( AND(Text( Valid_Fill_Request_Approval_Status__c )="Approved" , NOT(IsNull(FS_Scheduled_Date__c))), "4 Scheduled",
If( AND(Text( Valid_Fill_Request_Approval_Status__c )="Approved" , IsNull(FS_Scheduled_Date__c)), "3 Ready for Scheduling",
If(Text( Valid_Fill_Request_Approval_Status__c )="Not Approved", "2 Request Not Approved",
If( FS_Entering_COM__c <>"", "1 Request Entered", "")))))
CustomField.label: Valid Fill Status
